name: Terese Lopez

name: Michael Lorello
text: Nice personally sized pizzas cooked fresh. They even have a gluten free crust option.

name: Chuck
text: Build your own pizzas are nice when traveling with a party with different dietary requirements. Great place to grab a quick bite to eat! Staff is always friendly and efficient.

name: Sonja Torres
text: OMG the pizza here is amazing. I love the gluten free crust because it feels lighter than the regular crust but tastes just as good. I like that I can pick my own toppings and that it's affordable

name: Sabrina Granniss
text: Super great staff! Food was enjoyable but the staff made the day. Marshal and Chris, thanks!

name: diego gaviria
text: With a wide selection of toppings, a gluten free crust option anyone one can have pizza their way.

name: Jeffrey Kiser
text: Always delicious, and love that they make fresh GF crust to order!

name: Darshil Patel
text: Great Pizzas at an affordable price. The ingredients were fresh. You can make custom pizzas with the choice of your toppings too! Loved every bit of it! Will definitely visit again. Highly recommended.

name: Naomi Wright
text: WOW! Wow is an understatement! I couldn‚Äôt believe how great this place is and how I didn‚Äôt know about it sooner! When I went in, it was busy but they got me right in and out! Matt suggested the cauliflower crust, since I have a gluten ‚Ä¶More

text: Loved the pizza! Got the hot link and it was amazing!! They also have a new cauliflower crust which I highly recommend.

name: River Granniss
text: The staff here is amazing, Marshall and Chris are great :)

name: Anthony Le
text: Staff was incredibly rude, couldn't properly cut a pizza, and stingy with toppings. Best part, a father wanted to order pizza for his children when they came down from the rope course. He told one of the staff it would be just a few minutes ‚Ä¶More

name: Diana Jones
text: Very good pizza!! Chose this place because it had a dairy free cheese option, making it a good choice for vegans or people with allergies!

name: Adrian Ramos
text: Friendly staff and they make the food fast! There's usually a big line, but it's worth the wait! It's very loud, so if you're looking for a quiet place to dine, you might want to take the food home with you. It's fun to watch people climbing above you at "IT" which is an indoor climbing park located in the dining area.

name: Heather Allen
text: 5 people working, only 1 was actually not on her phone, she was also the only one that had a good attitude. Asked to order a large pizza and they said I'd have to order it online by downloading an app. Not sure why they'd have something on ‚Ä¶More

text: The best pizza I've ever had.  The variety of toppings is sure to please everyone in the family.

text: our family of 4 had a wonderful and super tasty meal here, after enjoying the giant ropes course at Jordan's Furniture. blaze employees Kiana, Jill, Aaron, and Matt were courteous, friendly, fixed a small issue with or order without even ‚Ä¶More

name: Richard R
text: It has kind of a Chipotle vibe, but the atmosphere and taste is great, not gonna lie the keto pizza will never be as good as normal pizza. However, I had white sauce, will update review with red sauce within a month or two!

name: Monica Vidro
text: Jon was incredibly helpful in specializing an order and accommodating my dietary needs. He really took it the extra mile. This location also has a great atmosphere inside Jordan‚Äôs furniture (light/music/water show)!

name: Vidhi Patel
text: Giving a three as the pizza was good. The employees, on the other hand, were very rude, and disrespectful. Need a manager on duty, and the staff need to be trained to smile or maybe just respect the customers.

name: Scott Williams
text: Don't be afraid to ask for double toppings, the staff is very accommodating and friendly.  Tonight, John patiently waited for me as I struggled to get coupons from my Blaze app.  I'll be back!

text: Aaron made a great pizza for me. Definitely coming back.

text: my first time coming here was a great one, had to leave a review! such great workers like one girl i think was named jada, wonderful pizza and wonderful services.

text: Was not expecting a furniture store to have such a cool place inside! Awesome atmosphere, friendly staff, and the pizza was fantastic and VERY reasonably priced

name: Autumn McCann
text: Aaron gives great customer service! Always makes sure my order is perfect and in a timely manner. Joyce is also great at making sure everything is perfect for me & my friends!

text: Very friendly, quick service. One of the employees knew what I was going to order before I could even get to the register. Great guys!

name: STEVEN ESKENAZI

name: Dar'Ron Brown
text: Here now and the staff are so friendly, I come here often and always greeted with a smile and pleasant customer service. I believe the young lady joyce and the young man aaron is working now. They had awesome service. Made me stop what I was doing and write a review. Made me want to come back. Great job guys keep up the work.

name: Sudeep Kumar
text: Like the Toppings and thin crust. Perfect if you like smoky texture for your pizza. I mostly choose Build your own option. I recommend Ovalini Mozzarella and Garlic combo as a toppings.

text: I love this place because I had a problem and Jonathon apologized and fixed it. Also this place allows you to have lots of toppings without charging you an arm and a leg. Another GREAT thing about this place is you do not have to wait long for a fresh hot pie.

text: This blaze pizza is inside a giant ropes course/jungle gym  inside a furniture store so the atmosphere leaves something to be desired. The actual pizza is good, but I'm not sure how much I want to sit there and eat it.
